articles.author: The Times
articles.title: William Foege obituary: epidemiologist in smallpox success - The Times
articles.description: Global health expert who played a key role in the eradication of smallpox using a ‘ring vaccination’ technique, dies aged 89
articles.content: William Foege could smell smallpox before he laid eyes on a patient. The odour, redolent of animal carcasses, often stopped him in his tracks, sometimes helping him to discover undiagnosed cases and … [+9705 chars]

articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: As browser wars heat up, Chrome adds new productivity features - TechCrunch
articles.description: Split View, PDF annotations, and 'Save to Chrome' features come to the Chrome browser.
articles.content: As AIcompanies and startups push their way into the web browser market, the world’s biggest browser, Google Chrome, is rolling out a handful of new features. The company on Thursday announced the off… [+2498 chars]
